## Additional Reading

Other resources&#8212;some required, some vital reference resources, and some optional "food for thought"&#8212;will be included in the  materials for each week's class. A cumulative resource list will be made available as part of this course site.

Steve Tale, _SQL: The Ultimate Beginners Guide: Learn SQL Today_, CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform, 2016

* This book is available for purchase as kindle or paper, at a relatively low cost. It's another good introduction to SQL that you might want to investigate if you find yourself doing more SQL
